page.title: 12A Child's Day in Maltby
page.content: I get up at 7am. I go into the bathroom and wash myself and clean my teeth, then I get dressed. At 7.25am I go downstairs and watch T.V. before having a breakfast of krunchy nut cornflakes. After getting my things ready, I set off for school at 8.15. I play football or tiggy ball with my friends before school starts. At 9am we have register and then do work such as number or writing. We have dinner at 12 noon. We have a choice of menu. When dinner play ends we go swimming, getting back for playtime which lasts fifteen minutes. After play we do more work until home time at 3.45pm. I normally go to Richard's to play before going to Karate club at 6.45pm. I get home at 8.20pm then I usually watch television before going to bed at 9.30pm.
